Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory96.png'}
{3: 'Hot brass casings scatter across the floor of the carriage, the steel barrel of the machine gun glowing faintly with a red-blue heat.'}
{3: "The battle against the infected mechanoids proves this new frame's absolute power, but it also raises doubts among Hanying's newfound companions."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: "...You got impressive skills, I've seen it for myself before.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: "But fighting the Corrupted hand-to-hand with such ease? Even the best soldiers I've ever trained couldn't pull that off.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Unknowingly, the few surviving soldiers gradually distance themselves from Hanying, subtly forming a loose encirclement.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: "I'm a simple man who speaks his mind. So, I hope you'll excuse my directness.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Behind his goggles, the veteran's eyes gleam with a predatory hawk-like intensity."}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: 'Who are you?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The rest of the soldiers remain on high alert, as if still in combat. The guns in their hands stay off safety.'}
{3: 'These people before her are the only link to Aerospace City, but in an instant, the chance of negotiation becomes much harder.'}
{3: 'Hanying carefully weighs her options, considering the best way to handle this situation.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: "...My identity and combat capabilities shouldn't be a source of conflict.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: 'Hmph.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The veteran soldier lets out a derisive sneer.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Either way, I did come from Kowloong...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: "No one doubts you're from Kowloong... but are you really a Kowloonger BORN and RAISED there?", 4: '1'}
{3: "She's neither skilled at clever arguments nor good at hiding her true identity behind lies."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: 'We\'ve seen those centaur-looking things, the ones they call "Constructs", but stuffing humans into those hunks of metal...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: 'Can they even be considered human anymore?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: "You might look human, but if you're one of those things...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: "I'm not a threat to any of you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hanying carefully sets her weapon down in a safe spot and takes a step back, a gesture meant to show she means no harm.'}
{3: 'She has anticipated this reaction after sensing their hostility toward mechanoids earlier.'}
{3: "Prejudice against mechanoids naturally extends to Constructs, whose bodies aren't made of flesh and blood. Still, she has no desire to treat these humans with hostility."}
{3: 'The chocolate in her pocket still carries the warmth from the girl who gave it to her. Hanying purses her lips and tries to speak again.'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'The forest is quite dangerous. Are you sure you want to waste time lingering here?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Even though I'm not human, I can still help you with my combat abilities...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: "Hmph, we wouldn't dare trouble someone like you.", 4: '1'}

{3: "The veteran signals his men to step back. Just as he's about to continue his interrogation, static-filled voices crackle through his walkie-talkie, forcing him to put the confrontation on hold."}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: "...Transport Convoy here, we have a situation... What's your status?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: "You've reached the ambush point? Do not engage. I repeat, do not engage.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Whatever the other party says catches the veteran off guard. Hanying\'s sensitive audio receptors pick up fragments about "the governor" and "numerous mechanoids."'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: "...Copy that, we're on our way.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He signals to the soldiers surrounding Hanying, and they all fall back to their transport vehicle.'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: "Sorry about this, but whether you're a Construct or some new tech we don't understand, we can't take any chances.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: "With your abilities, getting out of here shouldn't be a problem... But next time we meet, things might not be so peaceful.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He keeps his eyes narrowed in vigilance, only boarding the vehicle after ensuring all his soldiers are inside.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'What in the world happened in Aerospace City...?', 4: '1'}
{3: "She can sense it—beneath the soldiers' cold indifference lies a more dangerous brutality."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory821.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: 'But after that incident broke out... Under Spikehead\'s leadership, the mechanoids "executed" the former research director. Then, Spikehead installed a traitor as the governor and firmly took control of the city.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: 'Then those mechanoids started tormenting everyone with their 24/7 nonstop work demands, forcing people to rack up work hours in exchange for food, clothing, and other necessities.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: "They couldn't care less about the elderly or children—if you don't meet the work hours, they'll let you starve to death.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: "Who would've thought... that we'd end up fighting our own mechanoids...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory821.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'What kind of... "incident" happened there?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'What could have happened to cause such a drastic breakdown in the relationship between humans and mechanoids?'}
{3: 'With engines roaring, the vehicles drive straight away, their dark machine gun barrels trained cautiously on her position until they disappear from sight.'}
{3: 'She is now left behind by the soldiers, along with the hastily buried corpse in the dense forest.'}
{3: 'Just now... what kind of urgent "situation" forced them to leave in such a hurry, without even properly bidding farewell to their lost companion?'}
{3: "After burying the young soldier's body properly, Hanying lifts her head to gaze in the direction where the soldiers disappeared."}
{3: 'In the distance, the silhouette of a city is barely visible. Perhaps... more answers lie within its walls.'}
{3: 'No matter what happens, she must reach that place first, to find the "key" Cervantes spoke of and seize that "future."'}
